amendment.description: To improve health care under the medicare and medicaid programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 89 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 89 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 56. Record Vote Number: 21.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 89.
Amendment SA 89 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S1389-1393, S1402-1403) To improve health care under the medicare and medicaid programs.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 89 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 56. Record Vote Number: 21.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 89 proposed by Senator Clinton.
